venue.address_1: directions will be sent to those who sign up
venue.name: Jackie's Home

item.description:
Mint Juleps, Southern food, a big front porch with rockers .... Y'all come !

Please join your fellow Ex-Southerners for a Saturday evening get-together at a log home in a country setting. There will be icy Southern Mint Juleps, and Southern food, perhaps a poker game, and / or, a trivia game related to all things Southern, so brush-up on movies, literature, culture, etc. ; )
There is ample space for a large group to attend, and it is a nice country setting, up on a hill, over-looking a vineyard.
Please feel free to invite along your "honorary Southern" friends !



Location :
========
This get-together will be held at Jackie's home. It is very easy to get to, right off of Rt. 495. It is approximately a 40-minute drive north of Boston.

For directions, click on the "Message Board."


The host will provide :
=================
*** icy Southern Mint Juleps
*** a Bourbon Pecan Pie
*** some scrumptious bar-be-cue from Redbones
*** a red velvet cake in honor of Herb's birthday ... Happy Birthday, Herb !
( and of course a couple of bottles of champagne to go along with celebratin' Herb's birthday )
*** black-eye peas
*** some assorted 'cokes' ... if you're from the South, you 'get it'
( if you have a particular favorite 'coke', then BYO )
*** an open bar with the "basics", including "some" assorted bottled beers, though if you have a particular favorite, then BYO

~~~~~

*** Chris and his wife are bringing Red Beans and Rice with Andouille and Sazeracs !
( We are going to have a feast ! )

*** Gloria is thinking about bringing some luscious "lemon squares" ... one of my favorites !

*** Richard T. is planning on feeding an army, he's suggesting bringing Jambalaya, okra, etc. Everybody, come hungry !

*** Beth says she is considering bringing salad

*** Noel wants her contribution to be a cheese and crackers tray




What to bring :
============
Folks are requested to bring along some delicious Southern dish to share, so it will be a potluck with a Southern flare.
Don't worry if you are at a loss for what to bring, or don't have the time, or just don't cook. A simple 'take-out' item will be fine ( ... Kentucky Fried Chicken anyone ... ? )
For those of us who enjoy cooking ... great, go for it ... red beans and rice, gumbo, whatever your little heart desires.
There will also be available a Weber charcoal grill ( weather permitting ! ) for anyone who'd like to grill-out.


allergic to kitties ?
===============
resident felines .... Cairo, Eli, RosaLee, and Pearl


dogs are welcome :
================
You are welcome to bring along your dog. There may be other dogs attending as well.


I sincerely look forward to hosting this event, and meeting some of my fellow
Southerners !

Y'all Come ! - Jackie
item.name: Ex-Southerners Shindig at Jackie's Log Home
